com.virgilsecurity.purekit.storage.ram

Class RamPureStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.virgilsecurity.purekit.storage.ram.RamPureStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PureStorage

    public class RamPureStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements PureStorage
    PureStorage implementation that stores data in RAM.
    Use this implementation only to try out Pure.
    For any real-world usage please see VirgilCloudPureStorage, MariaDbPureStorage or implement PureStorage yourself.
